item.title: My experience at MozillaTN meetup 2017
item.description: In this blog post, I am writing about my experience participating in the MozillaTN community meetup held at Coimbatore this January. Mozilla is a global community of passionate people working to protect the web as an open resource. I was always interested in Mozilla for 2 reasons. First, Mozilla is one of the pioneers of the open source movement. As far as I remember, Mozilla Firefox was the first open source software I have ever used.
